Closeable tabs to restore: {"security":true}
Closeable tabs to restore: {"security":true,"sensors":true}
Closeable tabs to restore: {"security":true,"sensors":true}

Closeable tabs to restore: {"security":true,"sensors":true}
Closeable tabs to restore: {"security":true,"sensors":false}
